actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-66.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the printing of a history of the Committee on Finance as a Senate document.

summary.text: Provides that a compilation of materials relating to the history of the Committee on Finance be printed, with illustrations, as a Senate document, and that there be printed four thousand additional copies of such document for the use of that committee.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the printing of a history of the Committee on Finance as a Senate document.
